ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def OnCMD_EXCLUIRTODASExecute(command, entity): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode breadCrumbList = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles()
item = breadCrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CN_ADITIVOOBJETOS")) command.TransitoryVars.Add("HANDLECONTRATO", item.Handle)

def Load(widget): from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Contratos import CNAditivoEntrega from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode
breadcrumbList = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles()
aditivoObjeto = breadcrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CN_ADITIVOOBJETOS"))
if (aditivoObjeto.Handle != None): widget.View.Commands["CMD_GERARPRAZOS"].Visible = CNAditivoEntrega.EhAditivoAdicaoOuProrrogacao(aditivoObjeto.Handle)
